amendment.description: To provide that producers may change their election to participate in agriculture risk coverage or price loss coverage in the 2021 crop year.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3371 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3371 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4714, S4716; text: CR S4716) To provide that producers may change their election to participate in agriculture risk coverage or price loss coverage in the 2021 crop year.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3371 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3371 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 3224.
